Detect if the Email is Spam



Photo by Machine Learning in Action on KD Nuggets





This application is designed to detect whether an email is spam or not in order to save yourself and others from falling prey to dangerous emails

When using this application please just paste the body of the email into the text box. This will in turn be ran through our code and formatted correctly to run through our model. Once ran through the model we will effectively be able to determine whether or not the email that you have received is spam!
